protein.specific_function: Metabolizes sarcosine, L-pipecolic acid and L-proline.

go_class.description: oxidoreductase activity, acting on the ch-nh group of donors
oxidoreductase activity, acting on the ch-nh group of donors, oxygen as acceptor
folic acid and derivative metabolic process
L-lysine catabolic process to acetyl-CoA via L-pipecolate
